body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Request>
  <Claims>
    <Claim DateReceived="2021-09-16" DateOfLoss="2021-09-16" ClaimNumber="TC2-968159-2115dsds62222-238" CATCode="ASIGEN">
      <Policy PolicyNumber="TC2PGR932550618" />
      <Insureds>
        <Insured>
          <Contact First_Name="MICHAEL" Last_Name="MARSHALL" />
          <Address Street="5280 WILBUR RD" City="MARTINSVILLE" State="IN" County="MORGAN" Zip="46151" Country="US" />
        </Insured>
      </Insureds>
      <Coverages>
        <Coverage Name="APS1a" Coverage_Amount="100000.00" Reserve_Amount="500.00" />
        <Coverage Name="Building4" Coverage_Amount="100.00" Reserve_Amount="50.00" />
    </Coverages>
    <Deductibles>
        <Deductible Name="Building" Deductible_Amount="500.00" />
        <Deductible Name="Contents" Deductible_Amount="700.00" />
    </Deductibles>
      <Addresses>
        <Address Type="Property" Street="5280 WILBUR RD" City="MARTINSVILLE" State="IN" Zip="46151" County="MORGAN" Country="US" />
      </Addresses>
      <Loss_Specs>
        <COL Code="H" Desc="None" />
        <TOL Code="H" Desc="Hail" />
      </Loss_Specs>
      <Custom_Attributes>
        <Attribute Name="StatusATTRAP" desc="StatusATTRAP" value="NO" />
        <Attribute Name="StatusPublicADJ" desc="StatusPublicADJ" value="NO" />
        <Attribute Name="ClaimThird" desc="ClaimThird" value="NO" />
        <Attribute Name="EstLoss" desc="EstLoss" value="1" />
        <Attribute Name="PlanID" desc="PlanID" value="MFH" />
        <Attribute Name="PHA" desc="PHA" value="NO" />
        <Attribute Name="Contractor" desc="Contractor" value="1" />
      </Custom_Attributes>
    </Claim>
  </Claims>
</Request>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Request>
  <Claims>
    <Claim DateReceived="2021-09-16" DateOfLoss="2021-09-16" ClaimNumber="TC2-968159-211562-238" CATCode="ASIGEN">

          <Contact First_Name="MICHAEL" Last_Name="MARSHALL" />

      <Coverages>

        <Coverage Name="Building4" Coverage_Amount="100.00" Reserve_Amount="50.00" />

      </Addresses>
      <Assignments>

    </Claim>
  </Claims>
</Request>

item.name: Remove all resources from a claim and call for auto-assignment again
Un-Assign all parties from the Claim and manually assign specified parties
Un-Assign specified parties from the Claim.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Content-Type header generated by Postman.
